snippet: Representative Charles B. Rangel maintained about a 1,000-vote lead over State Senator Adriano Espaillat after election officials finished a hand count of ballots from the June Democratic primary.
abstract: New York Rep Charles B Rangel maintains about a 1,000-vote lead over State Senator Adriano Espaillat after election officials finish a hand count of ballots from the June Democratic primary, giving him an edge in his bid for the House.
lead_paragraph: Representative Charles B. Rangel maintained about a 1,000-vote lead over State Senator Adriano Espaillat after election officials finished a hand count of ballots from the June Democratic primary.

headline.seo: After Hand Count, Rangel Holds Lead Over Espaillat in Primary
headline.main: Rangel Holds Lead at End of Vote Count
headline.print_headline: Rangel Holds Lead at End of Count
